item.title: The Early Adopter Conundrum and Reacting to Comments
item.description: When you love new stuff but don’t really want to lose old stuff you write this kind of stuff. It’s about tech stuff that’s old and tech stuff that’s new.

item.title: Bash scripting for everyday actions
item.description: This article is the first in a series of posts about automating everyday actions. Weâ€™ll start with Bash shell scripting, which allows you to write scripts to automate dull, repetitive tasks.
